get.description:
Resolve a set of character IDs to character names

---

Alternate route: `/v1/characters/names/`

Alternate route: `/legacy/characters/names/`

Alternate route: `/dev/characters/names/`


---

This route is cached for up to 3600 seconds

parameters.description: A comma separated list of character IDs
parameters.name: character_ids

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

get.description:
Public information about a character

---

Alternate route: `/v3/characters/{character_id}/`

Alternate route: `/legacy/characters/{character_id}/`

Alternate route: `/dev/characters/{character_id}/`


---

This route is cached for up to 3600 seconds

parameters.description: An EVE character ID
parameters.name: character_id

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

200.description: Public data for the given character

get.description:
Get 50 event summaries from the calendar. If no event ID is given,
the resource will return the next 50 chronological event summaries
from now. If an event ID is specified, it will return the next 50
chronological event summaries from after that event.


---

Alternate route: `/v1/characters/{character_id}/calendar/`

Alternate route: `/legacy/characters/{character_id}/calendar/`

Alternate route: `/dev/characters/{character_id}/calendar/`


---

This route is cached for up to 5 seconds

parameters.description: The character to retrieve events from
parameters.name: character_id

parameters.description: The event ID to retrieve events from
parameters.name: from_event

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

schema.description: Up to 50 events from now or the event you requested
schema.title: get_characters_character_id_calendar_ok

application/json.error: Token is not valid for scope(s): esi-calendar.read_calendar_events.v1

get.description:
Get all the information for a specific event

---

Alternate route: `/v3/characters/{character_id}/calendar/{event_id}/`

Alternate route: `/dev/characters/{character_id}/calendar/{event_id}/`


---

This route is cached for up to 5 seconds

parameters.description: The character id requesting the event
parameters.name: character_id

parameters.description: The id of the event requested
parameters.name: event_id

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

200.description: Full details of a specific event

application/json.text: o7: The EVE Online Show features latest developer news, fast paced action, community overviews and a lot more with CCP Guard and CCP Mimic. Join the thrilling o7 live broadcast at 20:00 EVE time (=UTC) on EVE TV. Don't miss it!
application/json.title: o7 The EVE Online Show

schema.description: Full details of a specific event
schema.title: get_characters_character_id_calendar_event_id_ok

application/json.error: Token is not valid for scope(s): esi-calendar.read_calendar_events.v1

put.description:
Set your response status to an event

---

Alternate route: `/v3/characters/{character_id}/calendar/{event_id}/`

parameters.description: The character ID requesting the event
parameters.name: character_id

parameters.description: The ID of the event requested
parameters.name: event_id

parameters.description: The response value to set, overriding current value.
parameters.name: response

parameters.name: datasource

get.description:

Alternate route: `/dev/markets/{region_id}/history/`


---

This route is cached for up to 300 seconds

parameters.name: region_id

parameters.description: Return statistics for this type
parameters.name: type_id

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

200.description: A list of historical market statistics

date.description: The date of this historical statistic entry

get.summary: List historical market statistics in a region

get.description:
Return a list of orders in a region

---

Alternate route: `/v1/markets/{region_id}/orders/`

Alternate route: `/legacy/markets/{region_id}/orders/`

Alternate route: `/dev/markets/{region_id}/orders/`


---

This route is cached for up to 300 seconds

parameters.description: Return orders in this region
parameters.name: region_id

parameters.description: Return orders only for this type
parameters.name: type_id

parameters.description: Filter buy/sell orders, return all orders by default. If you query without type_id, we always return both buy and sell orders.
parameters.name: order_type

parameters.description: Which page to query, only used for querying without type_id. Starting at 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The server name you would like data from
parameters.name: datasource

application/json.error: 123 is not a valid market region
